channel.title: 317 pi how to add in lava cape animation
channel.description: Hey guys, on our rsps 317 pi, we have a lava cape. The problem is that the lava cape doesn't move like it should be flowing. How do I add this in? Thanks for your help!

item.title: 317 pi how to add in lava cape animation
item.dc:creator: @bbwf bbwf
item.description:
@bbwf wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:521636”]pretty sure it’s just a texture in the cache isn’t it?

maybe this will give some insight

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/25385-how-make-different-textures-fire-cape-move.html[/quote]
Can’t use this for my client…

Read full topic
item.source: 317 pi how to add in lava cape animation
